mapper.update: update sys_code_value_temp set error_flag = true , error_detail = concat(error_detail,'值编码已存在，不允许重复！') where batch_number = #{batchNumber} and (value in (select a.value from sys_code_value a where a.code_id = #{codeId}) or (value in (select b.value from sys_code_value_temp b where b.batch_number = #{batchNumber} group by b.value having count(0) > 1 )) )
mapper.select: select sum(case when t.error_flag = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as failureEntities, sum(case when t.error_flag = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as successEntities, #{transactionOid} as batch_number from sys_code_value_temp t where t.batch_number = #{transactionOid}
select t.row_number as row_index, t.error_detail as error_msg from sys_code_value_temp t where t.batch_number = #{batchNumber} and t.error_flag = 1 order by t.row_number asc
